programme.title: The Invincible James Lee
programme.desc: James Lee is a husband, father, avid athlete, and is about to become a double amputee. Follow James on his journey, from early doctor's appointments to the surgery room and eventual recovery.

programme.title: Kelly & Ramya
programme.desc: Kelly MacDonald, Ramya Amuthan and a team of blind and partially sighted contributors share arts, entertainment and lifestyle stories.

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S07EP16) When a Chinese dignitary visiting Toronto is poisoned, Crabtree teams up with the prime suspect - who he believes to be innocent - in order to track down the real killer.
Année : 2008
Avec : Yannick Bisson (Detective William Murdoch) Hélène Joy (Dr. Julia Ogden) Thomas Craig (Inspector Brackenreid) Jonny Harris (Constable Crabtree) Georgina Reilly (Dr. Emily Grace) Arwen Humphreys (Margaret Brackenreid) Allen Keng (Wu Chang) Russell Yuen (Sun Yang) Daniel Park (Yu Da)

programme.title: That Sex Show
programme.desc:
(S01EP04) From puberty to old age, disability impacts our sex lives in big and small ways. Rachele examines the way our needs and desires change throughout the course of our lives.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Fashion Dis
programme.desc:
(S02EP02) Philiz is a ball of energy who struggles with chronic fatigue. After getting stuck in a style rut during her recovery, she's on the hunt for elevated, accessible pieces to take her to the next level.
Année : 2022

programme.title: L'appel du coeur
programme.desc:
(S02EP09) Jack and Elizabeth experience a life-threatening ordeal, which makes them realize what's been keeping them apart. Later, a surprising arrest is made and a proposal takes place.
Année : 2014
Avec : Jack Wagner (Bill Avery) Pascale Hutton (Rosemary "Rosie" LeVeaux) Kavan Smith (Leland "Lee" Coulter) Lori Loughlin (Abigail Stanton) Daniel Lissing (Jack Thornton) Erin Krakow (Elizabeth Thatcher) Chelah Horsdal (Cat Montgomery) Mitchell Kummen (Gabe Montgomery) Gracyn Shinyei (Emily Montgomery) Martin Cummins (Henry Gowen)

programme.title: The Other Ordinary
programme.desc:
The Other Ordinary spotlights eight Canadians, and their director, who are the only professional, travelling theatre group made up of people of all abilities.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les quatre sens
programme.desc:
(S04EP01) Christine Ha and Carl Heinrich team up for a cooking show with an accessibility twist.
Année : 2014

programme.title: Les enquêtes de Murdoch
programme.desc:
(S06EP02) After a veteran of a brutal North African battle is slain by a sword, Detective Murdoch's prime suspect is the victim's fellow soldier, who is none other than Winston Churchill.
Année : 2008
Avec : Yannick Bisson (William Murdoch) Hélène Joy (Dr. Julia Ogden) Thomas Craig (Inspector Brackenreid) Jonny Harris (Constable Crabtree)

programme.title: Double Tap TV
programme.desc:
(S05EP35) On this episode of Double Tap TV, we are joined by Dawn Pickering, who describes her experiences raising a child who is blind. We discuss the challenges, lessons learned and support available for parents.
Année : 2008

programme.title: Disrupt
programme.desc:

programme.title: Our Community
programme.desc:
The Tetra Society's focus is to find solutions to overcome environmental barriers faced by people with disabilities, including sex toys. In this episode, we'll follow each step of a request being fulfilled.
